---
title: "Gallery"
output: distill::distill_article
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(slickR)
```

# Work projects

```{r}
slickR::slickR(
    list.files("img/work/",full.names = TRUE, pattern = 'jpg'),
    height = 400,
    width = '95%') +
  slickR::settings(autoplay = TRUE)
```
